CURL.option_code: option(BUILD_SERVER "Build the dedicated server executable" ON)
option(FEATURE_CURL "Enable auto-download support using cURL (client)" ON)

OpenSSL.option_code: option(BUILD_SERVER "Build the dedicated server executable" ON)
option(FEATURE_SSL "Build SSL for curl and authentication" ON)

SQLite3.option_code: option(BUILD_SERVER "Build the dedicated server executable" ON)

ZLIB.option_code: option(BUILD_SERVER "Build the dedicated server executable" ON)

MiniZip.option_code: option(BUILD_SERVER "Build the dedicated server executable" ON)

GLEW.option_code: option(FEATURE_RENDERER1 "Build and use the vanilla renderer (OpenGL 1/2)" ON)
option(FEATURE_RENDERER2 "Build and use the borked renderer (OpenGL 3)" OFF)

OpenGL.option_code: option(FEATURE_RENDERER1 "Build and use the vanilla renderer (OpenGL 1/2)" ON)
option(FEATURE_RENDERER2 "Build and use the borked renderer (OpenGL 3)" OFF)

GLES.option_code: option(FEATURE_RENDERER_GLES "Build and use OpenGL ES renderer" OFF)

Vulkan.option_code: option(FEATURE_RENDERER_VULKAN "Build and use Vulkan renderer" OFF)

Freetype.option_code: option(FEATURE_FREETYPE "Enable Freetype font library support (client)" ON)

security_library.option_code: option(FEATURE_SSL "Build SSL for curl and authentication" ON)
